author: Patsy McGarry
title: Medics concerned some over-70s ‘don’t understand concept’ of cocooning
description: Older people seen out in shops, believing they are exception to stay at home message
content:
Doctors and pharmacists have raised concerns about a lack of cocooning among some over-70s who do not not understand or are not adhering to the stay at home message.
Dr Mary Favier, president of the Irish College of General Practitioners, said over-70s were … [+2755 chars]
